title: Bolt in the Blue
lyrics:
Sick of biting back loose lips
Face first with a stiff fist
Can’t blink or I’ll be tricked
I’m gearing up to break
Yeah, I’m gearing up to break
Suck on a loose drip

From a hole in a steel grip

Flip my lids like elastic

Like a bad trip on acid

High like a misfit

I’m primed like a kill switch



Gearing up to break

Yeah, I’m gearing up to break

Gearing up to break

Yeah, I’m gearing up to break

Gearing up to break

Yeah, I’m gearing up to break



Throw me on the fire

Leave me for broke

I’ll get you higher

Breathe in my smoke

I am the riot

Bolt in the blue, blue, oh oh



Been the axe to your grind

For far too much time

Between the devil and the deep blue sea

Oh, you’re the line

I’m changing the tide

Like a thorn in your weak side

I’ll slowly bleed you dry

Don’t care if it’s suicide

Leave my mark with a quiet bite



Gearing up to break

Yeah, I’m gearing up to break

Gearing up to break

Yeah, I’m gearing up to break

Gearing up to break

Yeah, I’m gearing up to break



Throw me on the fire

Leave me for broke

I’ll get you higher

Breathe in my smoke

I am the riot

Bolt in the blue, blue, oh oh

Throw me on the fire

Leave me for broke

I’ll get you higher

Breathe in my smoke

I am the riot

Bolt in the blue, blue, oh oh



Hold on to your vicious lies

It feeds my heart

It fuels my fight

When my hands go cold

Hold on to your crooked smile

It feeds my heart

It fuels my fight

When my hands go cold

When my hands go cold

When my hands go cold



Throw me on the fire

Leave me for broke

I’ll get you higher

Breathe in my smoke

I am the riot

Bolt in the blue, blue, oh oh

Throw me on the fire

Leave me for broke

I’ll get you higher

Breathe in my smoke

I am the riot

Bolt in the blue, blue, oh oh
